import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import UserImg from "../../Assests/Images/user/sha.jpeg"; import { FcCamera, FcVideoCall } from "react-icons/fc"; import { BsXCircleFill } from "react-icons/bs"; function CreatePost() { //Text Input const [postText, setpostText] = useState(""); //Image Input const [postImage, setpostImage] = useState(); const imageChange = (event) => { const imageFile = event.target.files[0]; if (event.target.files && event.target.files.length > 0) { setpostImage(imageFile); } if (!imageFile.name.match(/\.(jpg|jpeg|png|gif)$/)) { return; } }; const removeSelectedImage = () => { setpostImage(); }; //Form Input let createPostFormIsValid = false; if (postText !== "") { createPostFormIsValid = true; } const createPostFormSubmissionHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); alert("okay"); }; return (
{postImage && (
)} Photos Videos
); } export default CreatePost;
